    • responseQueue

      private final SynchronousQueue<JsonMessage<BaseResponseData>> responseQueue
      The object needed to pass the response between two threads
      See Also:
      • SynchronousQueue API Although the SynchronousQueue has an interface of a queue, we should think about it as an exchange point for a single element between two threads, in which one thread is handing off an element, and another thread is taking that element.
